name: Abhinav
text: I was on the edge of my seat the entire time. The movie was an instant favorite.

name: Ehsaan Bajaj
text: I was completely immersed in the story. I was completely enthralled by every moment of it. The movie was an absolute pleasure to watch.

name: Alisha Kala
text: I couldn't stop thinking about it after it ended. I was left speechless by the sheer beauty of it all.

name: Arnav Ranganathan
text: I was hooked from the opening scene. The writing was sharp and witty.

name: Shalv Warrior
text: I was completely enchanted by every moment of it. I was completely absorbed by every frame of it. I was left breathless by the sheer brilliance of it all.

name: Himdyuti Sandilya
text: I couldn't take my eyes off the screen.
